Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT T2.DTVENCTO, (T2.DTVENCTO, -, 6days)
FROM seguros.v0parcela
 
  WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE
    AND T1.NRENDOS     = :NRENDOS
    AND T1.NRPARCEL    = :NRPARCEL
    AND T1.NUM_APOLICE = T2.NUM_APOLICE
    AND T1.NRENDOS     = T2.NRENDOS
    AND T1.NRPARCEL    = T2.NRPARCEL
    AND T1.SITUACAO    = '0'
/
 END SQL
